receive a certificate

The certificate of proficiency in the Czech language will become your competitive advantage in the labor market in the Czech Republic.
CzechLanguageLanding.FifthSection.Title: FAQ
CzechLanguageLanding.FifthSection.Questi: Who can apply for reimbursement of language course costs?

Foreign citizens, both unemployed and employed (but wishing to change jobs), can request funding for the course. They must register with the Employment Office either as a job seeker (uchazeÄ o zamÄ›stnÃ¡nÃ­) or as an interested party (zÃ¡jemce).
What if I don't have a visa and I am not in the Czech Republic?
During the free consultation, we will assess your situation and offer several solutions to obtain the appropriate type of visa.
In what format will the course be conducted?

Courses will be available in in-person (directly at GoStudy classrooms in Prague or Brno, according to your choice) or online format. The training lasts for 4 weeks (basic course). Classes are held daily from Monday to Friday with 3 lessons per day (15 academic hours per week).
How to obtain a certificate and what does it provide?

To obtain a certificate of proficiency in the Czech language, participants must attend a minimum of 80% of classes. An exam is taken at the end of the course. To pass the exam successfully, a minimum of 60% is required in both the written and oral parts.

Having a certificate of proficiency in the Czech language will assist with employment and improving work conditions (professionals with knowledge of the state language are more valued in the job market, in higher demand by employers, and can therefore expect a higher salary).
Who will be conducting the courses?

Qualified philology teachers and native speakers with extensive experience in teaching Czech as a foreign language will teach the courses. Highly qualified Czech language teachers with over 10 years of experience are responsible for selecting teachers and course methodology.
Mgr. Jana HudeÄkovÃ¡
(Prague branch, online)

Education: Faculty of Education, Charles University. Teaches Czech at GoStudy, leads Czech language marathons, conducts online teaching masterclasses, author of the UÄÃ­me se Äesky podcast, GoStudy online program methodologist, head of the GoStudy Prague Czech language department.
Mgr. Hana CiosovÃ¡
(Brno branch)

Education: Faculty of Education, PalackÃ½ University. Employee of the Czech Ministry of Education's Education Results Assessment Center, teaches Czech at GoStudy, head of the GoStudy Brno Czech language department.
Can I participate in the courses on a paid basis?

Yes, if you do not want to register with the Employment Office or do not qualify for the required type of visa, you can participate in these courses on a paid basis. You can assess your language level and learn about the cost during a consultation with a GoStudy expert.
Can I participate in all three courses if I want to learn the language from 0 to B1 and still qualify for reimbursement from the Employment Office?

Yes, you have the right to take all 3 courses, but to enroll in the next one, you will need to fill out the application for the Employment Office again, wait for the review, and only then continue your education.
In fact, after each course, you will have a 30-day break. During this time, you can use your time effectively, practice Czech, and hone the skills you have acquired.

GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Title: FAQ
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Description: WeÂ answer frequently asked questions about our Academy and Scholarships.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.1.T: Submit the application through the form above and instantly gain access toÂ the Academy bot.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.2.T: IsÂ there noÂ charge toÂ participate inÂ the Academy?
Yes, the Academy isÂ completely free and you only need toÂ register toÂ attend. WeÂ look forward toÂ seeing everyone!
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.3.T: When and how are assignments made?
You can complete assignments atÂ your own pace and schedule. WeÂ have noÂ strict deadlines orÂ requirements.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.4.T: What are the conditions for completing the training?

The conditions are simple: you need toÂ register asÂ aÂ student ofÂ the Academy, receive training materials and assignments, participate inÂ webinars asÂ aÂ listener and follow the results ofÂ the scholarship drawing (who knows, maybe you will beÂ the winner).
Completion ofÂ assignments orÂ participation inÂ webinars isÂ not mandatory!
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.5.T: When will the classes atÂ the Academy begin, and how long will they last?

You will gain access toÂ the Academy materials immediately after registration. Donâ€™t worry, itÂ wonâ€™t beÂ boringÂ â€” the GoStudy team has carefully designed the Academy curriculum toÂ make itÂ easy and interesting for all participants.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.6.T: What willÂ I get asÂ aÂ result ofÂ the training?
Every student will receive aÂ certificate ofÂ completion from GoStudy Academy, along with special bonuses for our educational programs.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.7.T: What isÂ aÂ grant and what does itÂ provide?

The GoStudy Scholarship isÂ aÂ certificate inÂ the amount ofÂ â‚¬1,400 toÂ â‚¬5,725, which the winner can use toÂ pay for all orÂ part ofÂ the university preparatory program offered byÂ GoStudy inÂ Austria, the Czech Republic orÂ Slovakia. This scholarship will allow the recipient toÂ enroll inÂ aÂ budget educational program inÂ Europe.
ItÂ isÂ important toÂ note that the GoStudy scholarship cannot beÂ exchanged for cash orÂ received asÂ aÂ cash equivalent.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.8.T: No, weÂ doÂ not have aÂ system ofÂ punishment orÂ expulsion from the Academy. IfÂ for some reason you donâ€™t want toÂ participate inÂ the Academy anymore, you can simply unsubscribe from the bot.
GrantsLanding.EigthSection.Questions.9.T: When will the results ofÂ the Grants Competition beÂ available?
Drawing ofÂ Scholarships among the participants will beÂ held every 2Â months and the results will beÂ announced onÂ the day ofÂ the draw.
What ifÂ I decided not toÂ wait for the draw and paid for the programme but ended upÂ winning the Grant?
All Academy participants who registered, paid for the program and won the scholarship will beÂ refunded the scholarship amount.

AboutUsLanding.FirstSection.Title: IsÂ your successful future inÂ Europe
AboutUsLanding.FirstSection.Text.Part1: WeÂ will prepare you toÂ enter and study atÂ European universities inÂ the Czech Republic, Austria and Slovakia qualitatively and inÂ aÂ short period ofÂ time. All you need toÂ doÂ isÂ toÂ study diligently and fulfil your teacherâ€™s tasks.
AboutUsLanding.FirstSection.Text.Part2: NoÂ language barriers: inÂ just one year you will beÂ able toÂ study atÂ university without any problems, communicate easily with your classmates and teachers and feel atÂ home.
AboutUsLanding.FirstSection.Text.Part3: WeÂ will quickly adapt you toÂ the language environment, familiarise you with the new culture and give you all the perspectives for your studies and career. WithÂ us you will learn the language, visit different European countries and make many new friends!
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Title: GoStudy principles
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Description: WeÂ provide aÂ high quality education and maximise the entry rate ofÂ applicants through our teaching principles.
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card1.Title: Language immersion
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card1.Text: From the first days ofÂ lessons you hear correct Czech, Slovak, German speechÂ â€” this allows you toÂ quickly get rid ofÂ the accent. Interaction and immersionÂ â€” aÂ special methodology that implies deep immersion inÂ the language environment and the fact that the learning process will beÂ based onÂ the interaction between heÂ teacher and the student.
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card2.Title: Openness and support
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card2.Text: Moving away from home and living inÂ aÂ new country isÂ always stressful. School supervisors are constantly inÂ touch with students and are ready toÂ answer any question, even ifÂ itÂ isÂ not directly related toÂ the educational process. For example: how toÂ apply for aÂ travel pass, aÂ bank card orÂ how toÂ make anÂ appointment with aÂ doctor?
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card3.Title: More than just studying
AboutUsLanding.SecondSection.Card3.Text: Studying atÂ GoStudy isÂ not only aÂ quality education, but also aÂ real family. Donâ€™t worry about not having time for fun because ofÂ your studies! With GoStudy you will have aÂ lot ofÂ interesting things toÂ do: sports competitions and trips, excursions, picnics, parties and quests.
AboutUsLanding.ThirdSection.Title.Part1: For thousands ofÂ international students, itÂ was

AboutUsLanding.ThirdSection.Description: Mgr. Anna ÄŒurdovÃ¡, director ofÂ the GoStudy language centre inÂ Prague, teacher, politician, honorary member ofÂ the Parliamentary Assembly ofÂ the Council ofÂ Europe and the Committee for European Integration.
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Title: GoStudy Reviews
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Description: What students and alumni say about the school.
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card1.Title: Adriano
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card1.Text: The foreign language was easy for meÂ inÂ general, but itÂ was difficult toÂ master specialised terminology inÂ Slovak. And ofÂ course, IÂ fought with the accent! Thank you very much toÂ the teachers for their patienceÂ â€” IÂ knew myÂ questions would always beÂ answered, even if IÂ thought they were silly.
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card2.Title: Diego
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card2.Text: Thanks toÂ GoStudy, IÂ learnt German and was able toÂ goÂ toÂ Austria toÂ study, whereÂ I graduated from university and now work asÂ aÂ doctor. AtÂ home, IÂ could never have dreamed ofÂ such prospects asÂ I have now. Thanks toÂ the GoStudy teachers for helping meÂ learn the language soÂ quickly and soÂ well!
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card3.Title: Jaya
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card3.Text: Leaving home was very difficult, IÂ was worried about howÂ I would feel inÂ aÂ new place. Thank you very much for the support ofÂ the GoStudy mentors! They helped meÂ toÂ adapt quickly, toÂ understand what and how, and not toÂ waste time onÂ unnecessary worries, but toÂ learn.
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card4.Title: Ngoc Anh
AboutUsLanding.FourthSection.Card4.Text: IÂ learnt Czech first online and then came toÂ Prague for aÂ course. MyÂ goal was toÂ enter the Higher School ofÂ Economics. IÂ succeeded, now IÂ am already inÂ aÂ Masterâ€™s programme andÂ I have travelled several times toÂ other countries asÂ anÂ exchange student. IÂ am very glad thatÂ I decided toÂ trust GoStudy inÂ myÂ time.
AboutUsLanding.FifthSection.Title: GoStudyÂ â€” the path toÂ education around the world
AboutUsLanding.FifthSection.Text: GoStudy opens the way toÂ quality education for students from all corners ofÂ the world. Thanks toÂ us, the world isÂ graduating new talents who play aÂ significant role inÂ scientific and economic progress.
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Description: Demand onÂ the labour market and high professionalismÂ â€” asÂ aÂ result ofÂ studying atÂ GoStudy and aÂ European university.
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Points.Title: Our students:
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Points.1: Know atÂ least one more language than their European colleagues
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Points.3: Adapt easily inÂ aÂ multicultural environment
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Points.4: Adapt quickly toÂ changes inÂ the workplace
AboutUsLanding.SixthSection.Points.Text: With aÂ degree from aÂ European university and knowledge ofÂ aÂ foreign language, you will choose from excellent offers onÂ the labour market and will never beÂ unemployed.
AboutUsLanding.SeventhSection.Descriptio: You can study atÂ one ofÂ our centres inÂ Europe orÂ choose anÂ online format.

AboutUsLanding.SeventhSection.Card1.Text: The main office ofÂ the GoStudy National Examination Language School isÂ located inÂ Prague, where you can apply directly for study programmes.
AboutUsLanding.SeventhSection.Card2.Text: There are branches ofÂ the school.
AboutUsLanding.SeventhSection.Card3.Titl: You can also prepare for your studies from home, inÂ parallel with your 11th grade studies
AboutUsLanding.SeventhSection.Card3.Text: For this purpose weÂ have developed anÂ online programme that isÂ just asÂ effective asÂ face-to-face study.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Title: FAQ
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Description: WeÂ answer frequently asked questions about our school and the process.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question1.Ti: IÂ am moving toÂ 11th grade, canÂ I prepare inÂ parallel with myÂ main studies inÂ anÂ online course toÂ enter aÂ European university?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question1.Te: Now itÂ isÂ really possible toÂ prepare for higher education inÂ Europe online. Previously, applicants had toÂ beÂ inÂ the country toÂ take the nostrification and entrance exams, asÂ well asÂ toÂ learn the language. Nowadays, learning aÂ language online isÂ just asÂ good asÂ learning itÂ offline inÂ aÂ classroom. Many universities themselves recognise the certificates ofÂ foreign applicants, and itÂ isÂ possible toÂ apply for internal recognition ofÂ the certificate remotely. InÂ addition, aÂ number ofÂ universities accept entrance exams online orÂ recruit students without exams atÂ all.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question2.Ti: How much does aÂ one-year language course cost?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question2.Te: From 4000 toÂ 10000Â euros, depending onÂ the city ofÂ study and the number ofÂ hours. This price includes comprehensive support: visa support, assistance inÂ the nostrification ofÂ the certificate, submission ofÂ documents toÂ universities, counselling onÂ admission. You can pay for your studies onÂ aÂ monthly basis.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question3.Ti: IÂ am unable toÂ attend the course yet due toÂ family reasons, canÂ I enrol now?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question3.Te: Yes, you can apply toÂ study orÂ start studying online straight away while the visa issue isÂ being sorted out. WeÂ have combined programmes inÂ the Czech Republic and Slovakia, where the first semester isÂ online and the second semester isÂ face-to-face inÂ Prague orÂ Bratislava, and aÂ wide range ofÂ online courses for entry toÂ universities inÂ Austria.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question4.Ti: What certificate willÂ I receive atÂ the end ofÂ the course?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question4.Te: Graduates ofÂ GoStudy courses pass the state foreign language exam, after which they receive anÂ A2Â or B2Â certificate (depending onÂ the intensity and duration ofÂ the course).
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question5.Ti: Are there age limits for admission toÂ European universities?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question5.Te: European universities have noÂ age restrictions. There may beÂ aÂ problem atÂ the Embassy when issuing visas toÂ people over 50Â years old, soÂ inÂ these cases you should take the preparation ofÂ visa documents more seriously.
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question6.Ti: What isÂ included inÂ the cost ofÂ the training programme other than the foreign language course?
AboutUsLanding.NinthSection.Question6.Te: WeÂ offer 2Â types ofÂ programmes: shortened programmes for applicants toÂ private universities and annual training programmes for applicants toÂ state universities onÂ aÂ budget (detailed information isÂ described inÂ the section Â«ProgrammesÂ» onÂ our website). The cost ofÂ the programme includes aÂ foreign language course, services for nostrification ofÂ the certificate orÂ diploma, provision ofÂ documents for opening aÂ student visa: confirmation from the state university and confirmation from the hostel about reservation ofÂ aÂ place; assistance inÂ solving everyday and organisational issues for the whole period ofÂ study atÂ our courses, consultations when choosing aÂ speciality and university, assistance inÂ submitting documents toÂ the admission committee ofÂ the university ofÂ your choice, adaptation programme. The annual programme also includes training courses inÂ the subjects toÂ beÂ taken atÂ the entrance exams (mathematics, physics, biology, foreign language, etc.) orÂ preparation for creative tests.
